Description of incident: The Escondido Union School District notified some students and employees of the district of a data breach that occurred when a district owned tablet and external hard drive were stolen from a backpack belonging to a district employee.The personal information saved on the laptop included student contact information, assessment results, and self reported income by parents. More Information: http://www.utsandiego.com/news/2015/feb/17/tp-school-district-warns-of-p...
